00001 /*
00002  * PURPOSE:
00003  *   Class representing an articulated rigid body. Stores the body's
00004  *   current state, allows forces and torques to be set, handles
00005  *   timestepping and implements Featherstone's algorithm.
00006  *   
00007  * COPYRIGHT:

00009  *   Portions written By Erwin Coumans: connection to LCP solver, various multibody constraints, replacing Eigen math library by Bullet LinearMath and a dedicated 6x6 matrix inverse (solveImatrix)
00010  *   Portions written By Jakub Stepien: support for multi-DOF constraints, introduction of spatial algebra and several other improvements
00011 
00012  This software is provided 'as-is', without any express or implied warranty.
00013  In no event will the authors be held liable for any damages arising from the use of this software.
00014  Permission is granted to anyone to use this software for any purpose,

00020  3. This notice may not be removed or altered from any source distribution.

00043 namespace {
00044     void SpatialTransform(const btMatrix3x3 &rotation_matrix,  // rotates vectors in 'from' frame to vectors in 'to' frame
00045                           const btVector3 &displacement,     // vector from origin of 'from' frame to origin of 'to' frame, in 'to' coordinates
00046                           const btVector3 &top_in,       // top part of input vector
00047                           const btVector3 &bottom_in,    // bottom part of input vector
00048                           btVector3 &top_out,         // top part of output vector
00049                           btVector3 &bottom_out)      // bottom part of output vector
00050     {
00051         top_out = rotation_matrix * top_in;
00052         bottom_out = -displacement.cross(top_out) + rotation_matrix * bottom_in;
00053     }
00054 
00055 #if 0
00056     void InverseSpatialTransform(const btMatrix3x3 &rotation_matrix,
00057                                  const btVector3 &displacement,
00058                                  const btVector3 &top_in,
00059                                  const btVector3 &bottom_in,
00060                                  btVector3 &top_out,
00061                                  btVector3 &bottom_out)
00062     {
00063         top_out = rotation_matrix.transpose() * top_in;
00064         bottom_out = rotation_matrix.transpose() * (bottom_in + displacement.cross(top_in));            
00065     }
00066 
00067     btScalar SpatialDotProduct(const btVector3 &a_top,
00068                             const btVector3 &a_bottom,
00069                             const btVector3 &b_top,
00070                             const btVector3 &b_bottom)
00071     {
00072         return a_bottom.dot(b_top) + a_top.dot(b_bottom);
00073     }
00074 
00075         void SpatialCrossProduct(const btVector3 &a_top,
00076                             const btVector3 &a_bottom,
00077                             const btVector3 &b_top,
00078                             const btVector3 &b_bottom,
00079                                                         btVector3 &top_out,
00080                                                         btVector3 &bottom_out)
00081         {
00082                 top_out = a_top.cross(b_top);
00083                 bottom_out = a_bottom.cross(b_top) + a_top.cross(b_bottom);
00084         }
00085 #endif
00086         
00087 }

00094 btMultiBody::btMultiBody(int n_links,
00095                      btScalar mass,
00096                      const btVector3 &inertia,
00097                      bool fixedBase,
00098                      bool canSleep,
00099                      bool /*deprecatedUseMultiDof*/)
00100     : 
00101         m_baseCollider(0),
00102                 m_baseName(0),
00103         m_basePos(0,0,0),
00104         m_baseQuat(0, 0, 0, 1),
00105       m_baseMass(mass),
00106       m_baseInertia(inertia),
00107     
00108                 m_fixedBase(fixedBase),
00109                 m_awake(true),
00110                 m_canSleep(canSleep),
00111                 m_sleepTimer(0),
00112                 m_userObjectPointer(0),
00113                 m_userIndex2(-1),
00114                 m_userIndex(-1),
00115                 m_linearDamping(0.04f),
00116                 m_angularDamping(0.04f),
00117                 m_useGyroTerm(true),
00118                         m_maxAppliedImpulse(1000.f),
00119                 m_maxCoordinateVelocity(100.f),
00120                         m_hasSelfCollision(true),               
00121                 __posUpdated(false),
00122                         m_dofCount(0),
00123                 m_posVarCnt(0),
00124                 m_useRK4(false),        
00125                 m_useGlobalVelocities(false),
00126                 m_internalNeedsJointFeedback(false)
00127 {
00128         m_cachedInertiaTopLeft.setValue(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00129         m_cachedInertiaTopRight.setValue(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00130         m_cachedInertiaLowerLeft.setValue(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00131         m_cachedInertiaLowerRight.setValue(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00132         m_cachedInertiaValid=false;
00133 
00134         m_links.resize(n_links);
00135         m_matrixBuf.resize(n_links + 1);
00136 
00137     m_baseForce.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00138     m_baseTorque.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00139 }

00145 void btMultiBody::setupFixed(int i,
00146                                                    btScalar mass,
00147                                                    const btVector3 &inertia,
00148                                                    int parent,
00149                                                    const btQuaternion &rotParentToThis,
00150                                                    const btVector3 &parentComToThisPivotOffset,
00151                            const btVector3 &thisPivotToThisComOffset, bool /*deprecatedDisableParentCollision*/)
00152 {
00153         
00154         m_links[i].m_mass = mass;
00155     m_links[i].m_inertiaLocal = inertia;
00156     m_links[i].m_parent = parent;
00157          m_links[i].setAxisTop(0, 0., 0., 0.);
00158     m_links[i].setAxisBottom(0, btVector3(0,0,0));
00159     m_links[i].m_zeroRotParentToThis = rotParentToThis;
00160         m_links[i].m_dVector = thisPivotToThisComOffset;
00161     m_links[i].m_eVector = parentComToThisPivotOffset;    
00162 
00163         m_links[i].m_jointType = btMultibodyLink::eFixed;
00164         m_links[i].m_dofCount = 0;
00165         m_links[i].m_posVarCount = 0;
00166 
00167         m_links[i].m_flags |=BT_MULTIBODYLINKFLAGS_DISABLE_PARENT_COLLISION;    
00168         
00169         m_links[i].updateCacheMultiDof();
00170 
00171         updateLinksDofOffsets();
00172 
00173 }

00176 void btMultiBody::setupPrismatic(int i,
00177                                btScalar mass,
00178                                const btVector3 &inertia,
00179                                int parent,
00180                                const btQuaternion &rotParentToThis,
00181                                const btVector3 &jointAxis,
00182                                const btVector3 &parentComToThisPivotOffset,
00183                                                            const btVector3 &thisPivotToThisComOffset,
00184                                                            bool disableParentCollision)
00185 {
00186         m_dofCount += 1;
00187         m_posVarCnt += 1;
00188         
00189     m_links[i].m_mass = mass;
00190     m_links[i].m_inertiaLocal = inertia;
00191     m_links[i].m_parent = parent;
00192     m_links[i].m_zeroRotParentToThis = rotParentToThis;
00193     m_links[i].setAxisTop(0, 0., 0., 0.);
00194     m_links[i].setAxisBottom(0, jointAxis);
00195     m_links[i].m_eVector = parentComToThisPivotOffset;
00196         m_links[i].m_dVector = thisPivotToThisComOffset;
00197     m_links[i].m_cachedRotParentToThis = rotParentToThis;
00198 
00199         m_links[i].m_jointType = btMultibodyLink::ePrismatic;
00200         m_links[i].m_dofCount = 1;
00201         m_links[i].m_posVarCount = 1;   
00202         m_links[i].m_jointPos[0] = 0.f;
00203         m_links[i].m_jointTorque[0] = 0.f;
00204 
00205         if (disableParentCollision)
00206                 m_links[i].m_flags |=BT_MULTIBODYLINKFLAGS_DISABLE_PARENT_COLLISION;
00207         //
00208         
00209         m_links[i].updateCacheMultiDof();
00210         
00211         updateLinksDofOffsets();
00212 }

00214 void btMultiBody::setupRevolute(int i,
00215                               btScalar mass,
00216                               const btVector3 &inertia,
00217                               int parent,
00218                               const btQuaternion &rotParentToThis,
00219                               const btVector3 &jointAxis,
00220                               const btVector3 &parentComToThisPivotOffset,
00221                               const btVector3 &thisPivotToThisComOffset,
00222                                                           bool disableParentCollision)
00223 {
00224         m_dofCount += 1;
00225         m_posVarCnt += 1;
00226         
00227     m_links[i].m_mass = mass;
00228     m_links[i].m_inertiaLocal = inertia;
00229     m_links[i].m_parent = parent;
00230     m_links[i].m_zeroRotParentToThis = rotParentToThis;
00231     m_links[i].setAxisTop(0, jointAxis);
00232     m_links[i].setAxisBottom(0, jointAxis.cross(thisPivotToThisComOffset));
00233     m_links[i].m_dVector = thisPivotToThisComOffset;
00234     m_links[i].m_eVector = parentComToThisPivotOffset;
00235 
00236         m_links[i].m_jointType = btMultibodyLink::eRevolute;
00237         m_links[i].m_dofCount = 1;
00238         m_links[i].m_posVarCount = 1;   
00239         m_links[i].m_jointPos[0] = 0.f;
00240         m_links[i].m_jointTorque[0] = 0.f;
00241 
00242         if (disableParentCollision)
00243                 m_links[i].m_flags |=BT_MULTIBODYLINKFLAGS_DISABLE_PARENT_COLLISION;
00244     //
00245         m_links[i].updateCacheMultiDof();
00246         //
00247         updateLinksDofOffsets();
00248 }

00252 void btMultiBody::setupSpherical(int i,
00253                                                    btScalar mass,
00254                                                    const btVector3 &inertia,
00255                                                    int parent,
00256                                                    const btQuaternion &rotParentToThis,
00257                                                    const btVector3 &parentComToThisPivotOffset,
00258                                                    const btVector3 &thisPivotToThisComOffset,
00259                                                    bool disableParentCollision)
00260 {
00261         
00262         m_dofCount += 3;
00263         m_posVarCnt += 4;
00264 
00265         m_links[i].m_mass = mass;
00266     m_links[i].m_inertiaLocal = inertia;
00267     m_links[i].m_parent = parent;
00268     m_links[i].m_zeroRotParentToThis = rotParentToThis;    
00269     m_links[i].m_dVector = thisPivotToThisComOffset;
00270     m_links[i].m_eVector = parentComToThisPivotOffset;    
00271 
00272         m_links[i].m_jointType = btMultibodyLink::eSpherical;
00273         m_links[i].m_dofCount = 3;
00274         m_links[i].m_posVarCount = 4;
00275         m_links[i].setAxisTop(0, 1.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00276         m_links[i].setAxisTop(1, 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
00277         m_links[i].setAxisTop(2, 0.f, 0.f, 1.f);
00278         m_links[i].setAxisBottom(0, m_links[i].getAxisTop(0).cross(thisPivotToThisComOffset));
00279         m_links[i].setAxisBottom(1, m_links[i].getAxisTop(1).cross(thisPivotToThisComOffset));
00280         m_links[i].setAxisBottom(2, m_links[i].getAxisTop(2).cross(thisPivotToThisComOffset));
00281         m_links[i].m_jointPos[0] = m_links[i].m_jointPos[1] = m_links[i].m_jointPos[2] = 0.f; m_links[i].m_jointPos[3] = 1.f;
00282         m_links[i].m_jointTorque[0] = m_links[i].m_jointTorque[1] = m_links[i].m_jointTorque[2] = 0.f;
00283 
00284 
00285         if (disableParentCollision)
00286                 m_links[i].m_flags |=BT_MULTIBODYLINKFLAGS_DISABLE_PARENT_COLLISION;    
00287         //
00288         m_links[i].updateCacheMultiDof();       
00289         //
00290         updateLinksDofOffsets();
00291 }
00292 
00293 void btMultiBody::setupPlanar(int i,
00294                                                    btScalar mass,
00295                                                    const btVector3 &inertia,
00296                                                    int parent,
00297                                                    const btQuaternion &rotParentToThis,
00298                                                    const btVector3 &rotationAxis,
00299                                                    const btVector3 &parentComToThisComOffset,                                              
00300                                                    bool disableParentCollision)
00301 {
00302         
00303         m_dofCount += 3;
00304         m_posVarCnt += 3;
00305 
00306         m_links[i].m_mass = mass;
00307     m_links[i].m_inertiaLocal = inertia;
00308     m_links[i].m_parent = parent;
00309     m_links[i].m_zeroRotParentToThis = rotParentToThis;    
00310         m_links[i].m_dVector.setZero();
00311     m_links[i].m_eVector = parentComToThisComOffset;
00312 
00313         //
00314         btVector3 vecNonParallelToRotAxis(1, 0, 0);
00315         if(rotationAxis.normalized().dot(vecNonParallelToRotAxis) > 0.999)
00316                 vecNonParallelToRotAxis.setValue(0, 1, 0);
00317         //
00318 
00319         m_links[i].m_jointType = btMultibodyLink::ePlanar;
00320         m_links[i].m_dofCount = 3;
00321         m_links[i].m_posVarCount = 3;
00322         btVector3 n=rotationAxis.normalized();
00323         m_links[i].setAxisTop(0, n[0],n[1],n[2]);
00324         m_links[i].setAxisTop(1,0,0,0);
00325         m_links[i].setAxisTop(2,0,0,0);
00326         m_links[i].setAxisBottom(0,0,0,0);
00327         btVector3 cr = m_links[i].getAxisTop(0).cross(vecNonParallelToRotAxis);
00328         m_links[i].setAxisBottom(1,cr[0],cr[1],cr[2]);
00329         cr = m_links[i].getAxisBottom(1).cross(m_links[i].getAxisTop(0));
00330         m_links[i].setAxisBottom(2,cr[0],cr[1],cr[2]);
00331         m_links[i].m_jointPos[0] = m_links[i].m_jointPos[1] = m_links[i].m_jointPos[2] = 0.f;
00332         m_links[i].m_jointTorque[0] = m_links[i].m_jointTorque[1] = m_links[i].m_jointTorque[2] = 0.f;
00333 
00334         if (disableParentCollision)
00335                 m_links[i].m_flags |=BT_MULTIBODYLINKFLAGS_DISABLE_PARENT_COLLISION;
00336     //
00337         m_links[i].updateCacheMultiDof();
00338         //
00339         updateLinksDofOffsets();
00340 }
00341 
00342 void btMultiBody::finalizeMultiDof()
00343 {
00344         m_deltaV.resize(0);
00345         m_deltaV.resize(6 + m_dofCount);
00346         m_realBuf.resize(6 + m_dofCount + m_dofCount*m_dofCount + 6 + m_dofCount);                      //m_dofCount for joint-space vels + m_dofCount^2 for "D" matrices + delta-pos vector (6 base "vels" + joint "vels")
00347         m_vectorBuf.resize(2 * m_dofCount);                                                                                                     //two 3-vectors (i.e. one six-vector) for each system dof       ("h" matrices)
00348 
00349         updateLinksDofOffsets();
00350 }

00404 void btMultiBody::setJointPosMultiDof(int i, btScalar *q)
00405 {
00406         for(int pos = 0; pos < m_links[i].m_posVarCount; ++pos)
00407                 m_links[i].m_jointPos[pos] = q[pos];

00420                 m_realBuf[6 + m_links[i].m_dofOffset + dof] = qdot[dof];

00433 btVector3 btMultiBody::localPosToWorld(int i, const btVector3 &local_pos) const
00434 {
00435         btAssert(i>=-1);
00436         btAssert(i<m_links.size());
00437         if ((i<-1) || (i>=m_links.size()))
00438         {
00439                 return btVector3(SIMD_INFINITY,SIMD_INFINITY,SIMD_INFINITY);
00440         }
00441 
00442     btVector3 result = local_pos;
00443     while (i != -1) {
00444         // 'result' is in frame i. transform it to frame parent(i)
00445         result += getRVector(i);
00446         result = quatRotate(getParentToLocalRot(i).inverse(),result);
00447         i = getParent(i);
00448     }
00449 
00450     // 'result' is now in the base frame. transform it to world frame
00451     result = quatRotate(getWorldToBaseRot().inverse() ,result);
00452     result += getBasePos();
00453 
00454     return result;
00455 }
00456 
00457 btVector3 btMultiBody::worldPosToLocal(int i, const btVector3 &world_pos) const
00458 {
00459         btAssert(i>=-1);
00460         btAssert(i<m_links.size());
00461         if ((i<-1) || (i>=m_links.size()))
00462         {
00463                 return btVector3(SIMD_INFINITY,SIMD_INFINITY,SIMD_INFINITY);
00464         }
00465 
00466     if (i == -1) {
00467         // world to base
00468         return quatRotate(getWorldToBaseRot(),(world_pos - getBasePos()));
00469     } else {
00470         // find position in parent frame, then transform to current frame
00471         return quatRotate(getParentToLocalRot(i),worldPosToLocal(getParent(i), world_pos)) - getRVector(i);
00472     }
00473 }
00474 
00475 btVector3 btMultiBody::localDirToWorld(int i, const btVector3 &local_dir) const
00476 {
00477         btAssert(i>=-1);
00478         btAssert(i<m_links.size());
00479         if ((i<-1) || (i>=m_links.size()))
00480         {
00481                 return btVector3(SIMD_INFINITY,SIMD_INFINITY,SIMD_INFINITY);
00482         }
00483 
00484 
00485     btVector3 result = local_dir;
00486     while (i != -1) {
00487         result = quatRotate(getParentToLocalRot(i).inverse() , result);
00488         i = getParent(i);
00489     }
00490     result = quatRotate(getWorldToBaseRot().inverse() , result);
00491     return result;
00492 }
00493 
00494 btVector3 btMultiBody::worldDirToLocal(int i, const btVector3 &world_dir) const
00495 {
00496         btAssert(i>=-1);
00497         btAssert(i<m_links.size());
00498         if ((i<-1) || (i>=m_links.size()))
00499         {
00500                 return btVector3(SIMD_INFINITY,SIMD_INFINITY,SIMD_INFINITY);
00501         }
00502 
00503     if (i == -1) {
00504         return quatRotate(getWorldToBaseRot(), world_dir);
00505     } else {
00506         return quatRotate(getParentToLocalRot(i) ,worldDirToLocal(getParent(i), world_dir));
00507     }
00508 }
00509 
00510 btMatrix3x3 btMultiBody::localFrameToWorld(int i, const btMatrix3x3 &local_frame) const
00511 {
00512     btMatrix3x3 result = local_frame;
00513     btVector3 frameInWorld0 = localDirToWorld(i, local_frame.getColumn(0));
00514     btVector3 frameInWorld1 = localDirToWorld(i, local_frame.getColumn(1));
00515     btVector3 frameInWorld2 = localDirToWorld(i, local_frame.getColumn(2));
00516     result.setValue(frameInWorld0[0], frameInWorld1[0], frameInWorld2[0], frameInWorld0[1], frameInWorld1[1], frameInWorld2[1], frameInWorld0[2], frameInWorld1[2], frameInWorld2[2]);
00517     return result;
00518 }
00519 
00520 void btMultiBody::compTreeLinkVelocities(btVector3 *omega, btVector3 *vel) const
00521 {
00522         int num_links = getNumLinks();
00523     // Calculates the velocities of each link (and the base) in its local frame
00524     omega[0] = quatRotate(m_baseQuat ,getBaseOmega());
00525     vel[0] = quatRotate(m_baseQuat ,getBaseVel());
00526     
00527     for (int i = 0; i < num_links; ++i) 
00528         {
00529         const int parent = m_links[i].m_parent;
00530 
00531         // transform parent vel into this frame, store in omega[i+1], vel[i+1]
00532         SpatialTransform(btMatrix3x3(m_links[i].m_cachedRotParentToThis), m_links[i].m_cachedRVector,
00533                          omega[parent+1], vel[parent+1],
00534                          omega[i+1], vel[i+1]);
00535 
00536         // now add qidot * shat_i
00537                 //only supported for revolute/prismatic joints, todo: spherical and planar joints
00538                 switch(m_links[i].m_jointType)
00539                 {
00540                         case btMultibodyLink::ePrismatic:
00541                         case btMultibodyLink::eRevolute:
00542                         {
00543                                 btVector3 axisTop = m_links[i].getAxisTop(0);
00544                                 btVector3 axisBottom = m_links[i].getAxisBottom(0);
00545                                 btScalar jointVel = getJointVel(i);
00546                                 omega[i+1] += jointVel * axisTop;
00547                                 vel[i+1] += jointVel * axisBottom;
00548                                 break;
00549                         }
00550                         default:
00551                         {
00552                         }
00553                 }
00554         }
00555 }
00556 
00557 btScalar btMultiBody::getKineticEnergy() const
00558 {
00559         int num_links = getNumLinks();
00560     // TODO: would be better not to allocate memory here
00561     btAlignedObjectArray<btVector3> omega;omega.resize(num_links+1);
00562         btAlignedObjectArray<btVector3> vel;vel.resize(num_links+1);
00563     compTreeLinkVelocities(&omega[0], &vel[0]);
00564 
00565     // we will do the factor of 0.5 at the end
00566     btScalar result = m_baseMass * vel[0].dot(vel[0]);
00567     result += omega[0].dot(m_baseInertia * omega[0]);
00568     
00569     for (int i = 0; i < num_links; ++i) {
00570         result += m_links[i].m_mass * vel[i+1].dot(vel[i+1]);
00571         result += omega[i+1].dot(m_links[i].m_inertiaLocal * omega[i+1]);
00572     }
00573 
00574     return 0.5f * result;
00575 }
00576 
00577 btVector3 btMultiBody::getAngularMomentum() const
00578 {
00579         int num_links = getNumLinks();
00580     // TODO: would be better not to allocate memory here
00581     btAlignedObjectArray<btVector3> omega;omega.resize(num_links+1);
00582         btAlignedObjectArray<btVector3> vel;vel.resize(num_links+1);
00583     btAlignedObjectArray<btQuaternion> rot_from_world;rot_from_world.resize(num_links+1);
00584     compTreeLinkVelocities(&omega[0], &vel[0]);
00585 
00586     rot_from_world[0] = m_baseQuat;
00587     btVector3 result = quatRotate(rot_from_world[0].inverse() , (m_baseInertia * omega[0]));
00588 
00589     for (int i = 0; i < num_links; ++i) {
00590         rot_from_world[i+1] = m_links[i].m_cachedRotParentToThis * rot_from_world[m_links[i].m_parent+1];
00591         result += (quatRotate(rot_from_world[i+1].inverse() , (m_links[i].m_inertiaLocal * omega[i+1])));
00592     }
00593 
00594     return result;
00595 }
00596 
00597 void btMultiBody::clearConstraintForces()
00598 {
00599         m_baseConstraintForce.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00600         m_baseConstraintTorque.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00601 
00602 
00603     for (int i = 0; i < getNumLinks(); ++i) {
00604         m_links[i].m_appliedConstraintForce.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00605         m_links[i].m_appliedConstraintTorque.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00606     }
00607 }
00608 void btMultiBody::clearForcesAndTorques()
00609 {
00610     m_baseForce.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00611     m_baseTorque.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00612 
00613         
00614     for (int i = 0; i < getNumLinks(); ++i) {
00615         m_links[i].m_appliedForce.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00616         m_links[i].m_appliedTorque.setValue(0, 0, 0);
00617                 m_links[i].m_jointTorque[0] = m_links[i].m_jointTorque[1] = m_links[i].m_jointTorque[2] = m_links[i].m_jointTorque[3] = m_links[i].m_jointTorque[4] = m_links[i].m_jointTorque[5] = 0.f;
00618     }
00619 }
00620 
00621 void btMultiBody::clearVelocities()
00622 {
00623         for (int i = 0; i < 6 + getNumDofs(); ++i) 
00624         {
00625                 m_realBuf[i] = 0.f;
00626         }
00627 }

00661 {
00662         for(int dof = 0; dof < m_links[i].m_dofCount; ++dof)
00663                 m_links[i].m_jointTorque[dof] = Q[dof];
00664 }
